text_block_list.text: One day, after I finished training with Maruzensky, a horsegirl cautiously approached.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Umm… excuse me! Hello there, Ms. Maruzensky!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hello! Hmhm, you don't have to be so formal. I believe you're the Special Week girl who moved in the other day, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aiiee! Umm, umm, your running's big time amazin', Maruzen! You look so calm, so relaxed, and yet you're so fast… I really admire you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I realized that to be the best horsegirl in Japan, I'd have to be at least that fast…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: The best in…? My, is that perhaps your dream?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes! That's right!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I wanted my moms to see me become the best horsegirl in Japan. That's why I came all the way from Hokkaido!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: That's great, I think you have a wonderful dream. I'm going to be rooting for you too! Do your best, Spe♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much…! Ah, um, if you don't mind… could we do some training runs together?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'd love to run with you, Marzen!! I hope I'm not being a bother!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: With me? Uh, let's see…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … I'll have to check my schedule! I'll get back to you later, is that alright?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wawah, of course!! I'll see you later…!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah, laters～♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … She looks up to me, huh? ……………
During our meeting about training afterwards, Maruzensky occasionally seemed to be dwelling on something.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: What? Oh…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … I'm sorry, I couldn't concentrate. I've been going over what Spe said to me earlier.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah… Oh, it's not that I don't want to, you know? A junior came asking so cutely, I'd love to help her out.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's just, you know… Spe has a very straightforward dream, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I wondered if there was really anything she could gain by running with me…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always get like this so quickly when I'm with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always get like this so quickly when I'm with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?
choice_data_list: Sure, we'll go tell her together.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?
choice_data_list: Sure, let's go tell her together…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thankies♪ So let's go find Spe then, shall we?
Even so, I could still see the hesitation in Maruzensky's step. I'm sure she's still worried about whether she can live up to the adoration of her juniors.
But I don't think she should worry too much, the image that the younger students and Special Week admire is likely—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer? What's going on? Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer? What's the matter? Let's get going!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: —so, let's do that training run! Are you free this evening?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course! Thank you very much…! I can't believe I get to run with Marzen… I'm gonna have to work hard…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my… there's no need to be so excited? It's just me you're running with…
choice_data_list: What exactly drew you to Marzen?
What precisely has drawn you to Marzen?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, trainer? What are you…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, trainer? What's with you all of a…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: What I admire about Marzen? Of course it was partly just how strong of a horsegirl she is…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But what I admire most… is that no matter what race, Marzen always seems to be having fun running!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wha…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Don't they say that horsegirls running in the Twinkle Series give everyone dreams?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I also came here to honor my mom's dream, but… I think it's horsegirls like Marzen who can turn those dreams to reality.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Strong, fast… and having more fun than anyone else. That's what makes watching so much fun, so exciting!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh Spe…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: … Oh, shoot! I'm on class duty today…! I'm sorry, I have to go! I won't be late for the training!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ah, y-yeah. See you later～

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Trainer. You've done it now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Trainer. You've gone and done it now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ooh, you want to play innocent, do you? Hmm, fine I guess. …Gosh, what am I to do with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I see, you want to pretend you don't know, do you? Hmm, fine I guess… Gosh, what am I gonna do with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: She sees a horsegirl who can fulfill dreams and inspire admiration with her running, huh…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Now that she's said that, I really can't let her down!
Looking a little refreshed as she said that, Maruzensky later went to the training session with Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hah, ha, hah…!! Ugh, she's as amazing as I thought… I can't close the gap at all…!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Spe, take a good look. Real speed…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Looks something like this!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wahh…!!
—Maruzensky displayed her magnificence to her junior.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew… I'm back, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew… I'm back, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My, do you think I'm tired already? I'm still going strong♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: And if I'm to show the younger cuties something they can admire — I don't have time to stop and wonder!
